briefTitle: Study of Circulating Cancer Cells in Patients With Metastatic Breast, Ovarian, Colon, or Pancreatic Cancer
officialTitle: Molecular Detection of Circulating Cancer Cells in Breast, Ovarian, Colon and Pancreatic Cancer
conditions: Breast Cancer, Colorectal Cancer, Ovarian Cancer, Pancreatic Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS:

* Radiographic or marker evidence of metastatic ovarian, breast, pancreatic, or colon disease
* Hormone receptor status not specified

PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS:

* Menopausal status not specified
* No history of any prior cancer

PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY:

* No prior therapy for metastatic disease
